text: Here's how to charge your Apple AirPods.

You can charge your
AirPods two different ways.
Option one: Put your AirPods in the case

and connect your case
to a Lightning cable.

Your AirPods and your case
will charge simultaneously.

And you cannot charge your
AirPods without the case,

but you can charge the
case without the AirPods.

the case recharges your AirPods
while you're on the move.

You can also charge
your AirPods wirelessly.

Simply place the AirPod
case onto a Qi charger.

Wireless charging comes
standard for AirPods Pro

Now your AirPods are
charged and ready to use.
